my favourite food is ice cream.
No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.

participant_2.background:
I wear comfortable, casual, and rock-inspired clothing.
I have a box of letters from my parents that I keep safe.
I wake up and watch my daughter sleep for a few minutes before getting out of bed.
I'm a determined person who doesn't give up easily, even when faced with challenges.
I like music that is upbeat and energetic, so I can keep my spirits up while I'm on bed rest.

content.text: What is your favorite food?
I love ice cream!
Same! What is your favorite flavor?
Chocolate chip cookie dough!
That is my favorite too!
I am a big fan of comfort food.
I prefer to eat healthy foods, but I do like to indulge in comfort food every once in a while.
I like to wear comfortable clothes too.
Me too! I think it is important to be comfortable.
I wear casual, rock-inspired clothing.
I like that style! It is very comfortable.
I like to listen to music that is upbeat and energetic.
I like to listen to music that gets me pumped up.
Me too! It helps me to stay focused and motivated.
I am a determined person. I don't give up easily.
I am a determined person too. I wake up early and watch my daughter sleep for a few minutes before getting out of bed.
That is sweet! I love spending time with my family.
I have a box of letters from my parents that I keep safe.
I love that! I have a lot of old photos that I keep safe.
I am glad we have so much in common.
Me too! I think we would be good friends.
